roleset.name: fill, load
roleset.note: PACK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pack' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from pack.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive with arg1
example.text: The league's promoters hope retirees and tourists will join die-hard fans like Mr. de Castro and pack the stands to see the seniors.

example.name: arg1 as PP
example.text: The crowning moment in the career of Joseph F. O'Kicki came as 300 local and state dignitaries packed into his elegant, marble-columned courtroom here last year for his swearing in as President Judge of Cambria County.
example.arg: into his elegant , marble-columned courtroom here
for his swearing in as President Judge of Cambria County

example.name: transitive with arg2
example.text: [One of the friends]-1 sweeps broken dishes and shattered glass from a countertop and starts *trace*-1 to pack what can be salvaged from the kitchen.
example.arg: what can be salvaged from the kitchen

example.name: all args
example.text: He returned home last Thursday, packed a bag with fresh clothes and reported for duty Friday in Walnut Creek.

example.name: Arg0,1,2
example.text: His packing the truck with all the pizza bozes it could fit was met with strange looks from the neighbors.
example.arg: with all the pizza boxes it could fit

roleset.name: send
roleset.note: PACK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pack' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from pack.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: odd: verb-noun idiom rendered as just verbal
example.text: Then , if Myra does nothing about [*] fetching her , I 'll pack her right back to her mother -- if I have [*-1]to take her myself '' ! !
example.arg: if Myra does nothing about [*] fetching her
if I have [*-1] to take her myself

example.name: Arg0,1,2
example.text: Her packing the boys off to their grandmother was a sign that Cherie had finally lost patience with the little communists.

roleset.name: Carry with oneself, as with a gun
roleset.note: PACK-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on questionbank. (from pack.05-v)

example.name: both args
example.text: What crooner joined The Andrews Sisters for Pistol Packin Mama ?

roleset.name: fill up, load
roleset.note: PACK_UP-V NOTES: I can get a transitive with arg1 ("John packed up his bags and left")but no reading with the arg2 (*"John packed up (his bags) with smokedherring"). (from pack.02-v)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: ``This was an invisible, powerful force that's almost impossible for a layman to contemplate,'' Mr. Warren says solemnly as the ghostbusting entourage packs up to leave.

example.name: with cargo
example.text: He was awarded [*-1] a fellowship [*]to continue his studies in Tokyo and he packed up his clothes , the biwa upon which he had been practicing [*T*-2] and his image of Acala , and left [*] to spend a week at home before [*] leaving the country .
example.arg: his clothes , the biwa upon which he had been practicing [*T*-2] and his image of Acala

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Jermaine's packing up his bags to leave showed Tito he was serious about quitting the band for good.

roleset.name: ingest a large quantity
roleset.note: PACK_AWAY-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from pack.04-v)

example.name: both args
example.text: What I 'm amazed by is how-1 these alders apparently pack away the booze *-1.
